issue.title: #19: Remerge JQI with Monash.  Then get ground rules down for proper behavior with rules.

content.raw: Agreed, and the plugin system is a good way to keep the code maintainable regardless of preferences for what should be enabled and not. So basically instead of putting code at the beginning and end of the queue, we'd add things like a "pre_shot_actions" hook and a "post_shot_actions" hook to the plugin system, and then have the plugins register actions to occur at those points and keep track of their state internally.
